title: Slow cooked chicken jalfrezi
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '5 cardamom pods', '8 whole cloves', '3 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '3 onions, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '675g chicken pieces, skin removed', '2 tablespoons grated root ginger', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '6 medium tomatoes, chopped', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon chilli powder, or to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 green peppers, cut into strips', '1 teaspoon garam masala', 'chopped fresh coriander, to garnish']
